title: Facebook needs to drop the pretence. It's just doing what suits its bottom line
text:
So the Facebook front against ‘fake news’ crumbles as soon as it suits Mark Zuckerberg’s needs. In a rambling and incongruous speech at Georgetown University, the CEO of the billion-strong social media platform sought to swerve the responsibility he himself gave under the nebulous guise of ‘free speech’.

Zuckerberg defended his company’s decision to allow politicians to post misleading propaganda, saying that private companies ‘should not censor politicians’.
